name: Square (azgoum)
description:
Hi everyone,

I'm actually applying to be a Game Designer in France and this is the first game of a long series (I hope). I have a master's degree in psychology and another one in innovative project management (Sorbonne) and my goal is to show my game design skills, applied on an prototype.

I realise this is not the game of the year, but I believe I show an original concept (not a copy) and build it to its minimal enjoyable version. I go after quantity over quality in order to discover several types of games.

Contact me for feedback or more information at : goumiriaziz@gmail.com

Next version upgrades (19/01) :

  • New goal (rather than just "highest score possible")
  • Sound control for all sounds and music
  • Specific sound for Coins
  • Signals on scaling
  • More items dropped with effects
  • Bug fixes
  • Performance improvements on later stages of the game
